author: Matt Novak-Zarate
comment: I've tried a number of forecast apps in the past. I recently got a new phone and thought "I should try different weather apps again", so I did. I was using Dark Sky, as well as google's weather, and the weather from Bixby. It all simply pales in comparison to what they've put together here. No service is more accurate, no service is easier to see your forecast, and no service has as a many options for what kinds of alerts you get.   Sure, it's not the prettiest app in the world, but it looks good enough, and the information available far outweighs any lackings in the design.

author: clmalcuit
comment: Update as of 12/31/17... The map is still showing the weather from yesterday .What is up with that?? Need a fix pls!!! That is not acceptable. My other weather app is fine. Uninstall on the horizon!!

author: Wilber Ruiz Alago
comment: Because I enjoy a full weather reading with temperature, wind chill, gusts, and more this app excels. I've tracked hurricanes using the map, sent clearly understood screenshots to family and more.

author: Mallory Watkins
comment: I live on a island off the coast of Maine, so weather is both important to anticipate, and difficult to do so. This is the most accurate app by far. And the descriptions are clear and detailed.

author: Luke Pola
comment: No nonsense, unintrusive app with easy to navigate maps and forecasts. And if you're willing to wade through the weather jargon, the Forecast Discussion is insanely detailed and accurate.

author: Joe Hinds
comment: Poor radar, I'm watching the snow storm 1 mile from me snowing heavily and app shows 30 miles away

author: Johanna Kennedy
comment: Love NOAA! VERY ACCURATE for my area. Wish there were more detailed reports for Europe. I do understand that it is a national site, but wish they partnered with European site to include Europe. I have a child living in Europe.

I want a weather app where I can enter coordinates to get weather at odd locations.  This one does it--and lets you save that location.  No other app I tried did that.  Plus, you can just find the spot on the map, so you don't even have to bother with coordinates.  And you get NOAA weather which is better for small towns and rural areas.  And the radar map is great!  This is by far the best weather app, and I tried many.

author: chrysler peon
comment: This is the most accurate weather app I've ever had. I love the fact that it gets its readings from the local airport which is only a few miles from me, instead of a city that's fifty miles away.

author: Black Dogs Farm
comment: As accurate as it gets. We have tried about 8 other highly rated apps over the past few years and this is still the most accurate and useful, if not the fanciest.
Good ap, I can put in multiple address and go to the destination and know what the weather is supposed to be there.
It won't show temp in notification bar, no how many times I refresh, or reinstall...no good

reply.author: Pandamonium Software
reply.content: What location are you checking? Did you enable Current Conditions notification in the app settings? pandamoniumsoftware@gmail.com

author: Tammy Stewart
comment: By far the most accurate info compared to any other app I have tried. I live in the mountains and other apps tell me it is clear when it is snowing. The only one I use. Highly recommend.

author: james hall
comment: Works well for the most part, but wish snowfall analysis was more easily available like the full website.

author: Rachel Ruebner
comment: Very accurate! Very few & unobtrusive ads. And, gives me the weather in the little German town my family and I live in - even with the map!

author: ian hedlund
comment: No longer works.  Very inaccurate.

author: Erik Holmquist
comment: It's a great app for general weather info. I especially like the ability to save unlimited locations. The map is very good too.

author: Bonnie Eddington
comment: there are few permissions, and a short simple description of weather conditions....

author: MP Bumsted
comment: This is great for warnings, regional views, and details. Easy to configure. Just the info you want and no extraneous dazzle

author: scottt sinclair
comment: , I've been using this app for a lot of years it works better than any I've found and is always 98% accurate

author: Jenny Tudor
comment: Like the hourly wind forecasts. Most accurate 48hr forecast out there! Keep up the good work!

author: Debi Hammontree
comment: I look at it every morning to see what the weather is going to be n it's always correct so i love it NOAA!!😆

author: Mark Mullins
comment: Hands down the best weather app. Strictly business and no fluff. When weather matters,  use NOAA

author: Samuel D Sadtler 3
comment: Living on the Pacific Northwest coast, I find this app to be extremely useful for both business and pleasure.

author: Michelle kruse
comment: So far this app had been accurate with my local weather, wind and storm alerts.
it's handy and accurate when you have hours plants outside and need to know if frost is coming
I use it as my primary weather forecast tool. Works for me.

author: Mark Harder
comment: Gives me all the information I need or want.

author: jeffleann metz
comment: A little quirky, but once you use it a few times it's great.
App works just as I hoped it would.

author: WildBill06419
comment: Accurate & very up to date no reports ...intuitive user interface

author: Cheryl Jarman
comment: Love this app. Can add all my favorite places to see their weather.
It tells the weather. I like it.

author: Chris Grier
comment: For accurate, easy to access local weather, this app does the trick.
Doesn't update often enough.!!

reply.author: Pandamonium Software
reply.content: Update frequency is determined by NOAA, usually every 4-6 hours

author: Ben W
comment: The best weather app ever.  The adds are not bothersome at all.

author: Gail DeBono
comment: Love being able to get accurate up to the minute forecast.

author: jmoon threesixtyfour
comment: Has all the basic weather info you need on a phone

author: Judith Leconte
comment: Best app for our needs..detail on weather in several key locations..

author: Christopher George
comment: Awesome, accurate, THE BEST! Thank you so much!
